item.title: Tourists are disappointed with shopping in Singapore, while locals are loyal to their telecommunications companies
item.description:
A study by the Institute of Service Excellence (ISES) at Singapore Management University reveals a drop in customer satisfaction within Singapore’s retail and info-communications sectors. The 2014 Q1 Customer Satisfaction Index of Singapore (CSISG) indicates a 2.5 point (3.5%) decrease to 69.6 points for retail and a 0.9 point (1.3%) decrease to 66.8 points for info-communications, both compared to the previous year.
